org.ingatan.component.librarymanager
Class FlexiQuestionContainer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.AbstractQuestionContainer
                      org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.FlexiQuestionContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FlexiQuestionContainer
extends AbstractQuestionContainer

This question container type is used for freeform questions. It consists of three rich text fields; question text, answer text, and post-answer text. The post-answer text field is optional, and is hidden when the option is not selected.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form
